sentences.sContent: Michael’s shoulders heaved with silent laughter.
sentences.sCn: 迈克尔憋着不笑出声来，双肩直抖。

sentences.sContent: The sea heaved up and down beneath the boat.
sentences.sCn: 船的下面大海波涛汹涌。

synos.tran: 举起；使起伏；投掷；恶心；发出（叹息等）
举起；起伏；投掷；一阵呕吐

remMethod.val: 董存瑞举起(heave)炸药包， 直到爆炸也没离开(leave)

words.tran: 挑夫，[机] 杠杆；举起物件的装置；举起者

trans.tranOther: to move up and down with very strong movements

trans.tranCn: 举起，提起，拉起，拖；扔；发出
trans.tranOther: to pull or lift something very heavy with one great effort

trans.tranCn: 举起； 起伏， 升降
trans.tranOther: a strong rising or falling movement
